text: Under Your Spell is a 1936 American romantic comedy movie directed by Otto Preminger and starring Lawrence Tibbett, Wendy Barrie, Gregory Ratoff, Arthur Treacher, Gregory Gaye. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1936 comedy movies Category:1930s American romance movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Otto Preminger
title: Under Your Spell (movie)
